#if defined(USE_TEX_ADDR)
extern unsigned short spot_chr_lut[];
extern unsigned char spot_chr_tex[];
void *spot_chr_tex_addr[] = {
#if defined(NON_PALETTE)
	0,
#else
	spot_chr_lut,
#endif
#if defined(NON_TEXTURE)
	0,
#else
	spot_chr_tex,
#endif
};
#endif

#if defined(USE_TEX_SIZE)
unsigned short spot_chr_tex_size[] = { 58, 58, 4, 0, };
#endif

#if !defined(NON_PALETTE)
unsigned short spot_chr_lut[] = {
0x0000,0x1085,0x2109,0x318d,0x4211,0x5295,0x6319,0x739d,0x8c63,0x9ce7,0xad6b,0xbdef,0xce73,0xdef7,0xef7b,0xffff,
};
#endif
